entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. A few showers beginning near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. A few showers beginning late in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
